vine.math.vector

Class MutableVec2f

  • java.lang.Object
    • vine.math.vector.Vec2f
      • vine.math.vector.MutableVec2f
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Transformable

    public class MutableVec2f
extends Vec2f
implements Transformable
    Mutable version of Vec2f.
    Author:
    Steffen Kromm, first created on 04.05.2016
    See Also:
    Vec2f, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class vine.math.vector.Vec2f

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MutableVec2f()
      Creates a zero vector.
      MutableVec2f(float x, float y)
      Creates a new Vector2f object, that represents the mathematical vector 2d with the given float element.
      MutableVec2f(Vec2f vector)
      Creates a copy of the given vector.
